title._content: Majestic Theatre Interior in Keene New Hampshire

description._content: TITLE Majestic Theatre Interior in Keene New Hampshire CREATOR Whitehouse, Bion, Keene NH SUBJECT Theaters - NH - Keene DESCRIPTION Photograph of the Majestic Theatre on Church Street in Keene NH. "Motion picture entertainment became established in Keene with the opening of the Majestic Theater on Church Street on Jan.9, 1905, as the "Nickel Theater...The Majestic proudly announced that almost 2 miles of film were shown at each performance and suggested that Keene citizens "get the habit", which they did." This building was torn down in 1937. PUBLISHER Keene Public Library and the Historical Society of Cheshire County DATE DIGITAL 20120511 DATE ORIGINAL 1900-1920? RESOURCE TYPE photographs FORMAT image/jpg RESOURCE IDENTIFIER hsykwhk286 (8-09) RIGHTS MANAGMENT No known copyright restrictions.
